content:
09c57cf9358d4893b:
  'Description': Identifies issues with connecting the device to other devices,
    networks, or the internet.
  'Name': Connectivity Problems
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The type of mobile device experiencing connectivity issues.
    'Identifier': c5bc5233b3f348d6b
    'Name': device_type
    'Required-values':
    - smartphone
    - tablet
    - wearable
  - 'Description': The operating system installed on the mobile device.
    'Identifier': 94a345a6ac6744618
    'Name': operating_system
  - 'Description': The type of connectivity causing issues.
    'Identifier': fdeeecbaefd544f0b
    'Name': connectivity_type
  - 'Description': The network provider or carrier for the mobile device.
    'Identifier': 0092dbac384e4d04a
    'Name': network_provider
    'Required-values':
    - Verizon
    - AT&T
    - T-Mobile
    - Sprint
    - Vodafone
    - EE
    - Deutsche Telekom
    - Orange
    - "Telef\xF3nica"
    - China Mobile
    - NTT Docomo
218fa84df2ae4d9d9:
  'Description': Describes problems related to the device's keyboard such
    as keys not responding or typing incorrectly.
  'Name': Keyboard Issue
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The type of mobile device experiencing the keyboard issue.
    'Identifier': 1aa8c93e95694e44b
    'Name': device_type
  - 'Description': The brand of the mobile device experiencing the keyboard
      issue.
    'Identifier': 86c09aba1d9e47d5b
    'Name': device_brand
  - 'Description': The specific model of the mobile device experiencing the
      keyboard issue.
    'Identifier': 7047d648ebb649dd8
    'Name': device_model
  - 'Description': The type of keyboard affected by the issue.
    'Identifier': b2aa21230786426a8
    'Name': keyboard_type
    'Required-values':
    - physical
    - virtual
    - both
  - 'Description': A description of the keyboard issue.
    'Identifier': 31e3da314e984a3e9
    'Name': issue_description
3043316efaf748659:
  'Description': This intent focuses on providing information about the cost
    of tickets for various events and seating options.
  'Name': Ticket Pricing
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The type of event for which the ticket is being purchased.
    'Identifier': 284c47db91fc4866a
    'Name': event
  - 'Description': The location where the event is taking place.
    'Identifier': 1bb2ea946c8648d5a
    'Name': venue
  - 'Description': The category of ticket being purchased.
    'Identifier': 8a1c5858a8494c0d8
    'Name': ticket_type
  - 'Description': The number of tickets being purchased.
    'Identifier': d5dbe9ce2d8049aa9
    'Name': quantity
  - 'Description': The date of the event for which the ticket is being purchased.
    'Identifier': 463f51049a3a461cb
    'Name': date
360c14953bd043e28:
  'Description': This intent is about reserving a ticket for a specific event,
    securing a seat without paying upfront.
  'Name': Reserve Ticket
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The name of the event for which the ticket is being reserved.
    'Identifier': ad2821f4b8374114b
    'Name': event
  - 'Description': The location where the event will take place.
    'Identifier': f1720a1351434ccda
    'Name': venue
  - 'Description': The date of the event for which the ticket is being reserved.
    'Identifier': d25f869f91504e488
    'Name': date
  - 'Description': The time of the event for which the ticket is being reserved.
    'Identifier': ab9fb836784c4e30b
    'Name': time
  - 'Description': The specific seat or section of the venue for which the
      ticket is being reserved.
    'Identifier': af819c275f2d43518
    'Name': seat
  - 'Description': The number of tickets being reserved.
    'Identifier': b3f9d7015fd3456aa
    'Name': quantity
    'Required-values':
    - '1'
    - '2'
    - '3'
    - '4'
    - '5'
  - 'Description': The price the user is willing to pay for the ticket.
    'Identifier': 1d561b3fecf6471aa
    'Name': price
7b153107ade946b8b:
  'Description': This intent is related to requesting and receiving a refund
    for a previously purchased ticket under certain conditions.
  'Name': Refund Inquiry
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The unique identifier of the ticket to inquire about.
    'Identifier': f30824f379b54db48
    'Name': ticket_id
  - 'Description': The name of the event for which the ticket was purchased.
    'Identifier': 69842a8ad13646aaa
    'Name': event_name
    'Required-values':
    - concert name
    - sport event name
    - movie title
    - show name
  - 'Description': The date when the ticket was purchased.
    'Identifier': d4e3b983917c43bf9
    'Name': purchase_date
  - 'Description': The method used to purchase the ticket.
    'Identifier': 6085a07dc238413e8
    'Name': purchase_method
d8bcb109ebf449dc9:
  'Description': Refers to the process of updating the device's operating
    system or apps to the latest version.
  'Name': Software Updates
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The type of mobile device that needs a software update.
    'Identifier': 1cc649b520b34cdb8
    'Name': device_type
  - 'Description': The operating system of the mobile device.
    'Identifier': d980dfd45d21448fa
    'Name': operating_system
  - 'Description': The type of software update for the mobile device.
    'Identifier': f0326ec66b9649609
    'Name': software_update_type
dee0b9a6f5af45299:
  'Description': This intent describes the process of exchanging a previously
    purchased ticket for a different event or date.
  'Name': Exchange Ticket
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The name of the event for which the ticket is being exchanged.
    'Identifier': baf288e907a444ddb
    'Name': event
  - 'Description': The type of the original ticket being exchanged.
    'Identifier': faa2c957dba74f32b
    'Name': original_ticket_type
  - 'Description': The type of the new ticket for the exchanged event.
    'Identifier': 345039b7eed84c939
    'Name': new_ticket_type
  - 'Description': The reason for exchanging the ticket.
    'Identifier': 5dd5a8cb51934f5bb
    'Name': exchange_reason
fbc66417213d4adbb:
  'Description': This intent is about buying a ticket for an event, specifying
    the desired seating and providing payment information.
  'Name': Purchase Ticket
  'Attribute':
  - 'Description': The name of the event for which the ticket is being purchased.
    'Identifier': b7b87ca2714740658
    'Name': event_name
  - 'Description': The location where the event will take place.
    'Identifier': 926046bb472e4d908
    'Name': event_location
  - 'Description': The date on which the event will occur.
    'Identifier': ad4dd1f57878445cb
    'Name': event_date
    'Required-values':
    - '2023-01-01'
    - '2023-02-02'
    - '2023-03-03'
    - '2023-04-04'
  - 'Description': The type of ticket being purchased.
    'Identifier': 6f0f5a199d0e42bf8
    'Name': ticket_type
  - 'Description': The number of tickets being purchased.
    'Identifier': 85dc3faf29904fe6a
    'Name': quantity

In the realm of AI, NLP, and virtual assistants, identifying user intentions is crucial. It involves examining user inputs and categorizing them based on predefined intent labels. A single input might match multiple intents. Once an appropriate intent is identified, we examine associated entities to extract pertinent information from the user input. Not all intents involve entities.
Categorization refers to aligning user inputs with suitable categories and their respective attributes. Similar to intents, multiple categories can apply to one input. Extracted attributes enhance the interaction, guiding users through automated workflows efficiently.

For this unified task, your goal is to identify the correct category and its related attributes, given a user input. Your response format should adhere to the YAML structures.

Consider this example for "I want to reserve 5 tickets":

categories:
- category_id: 360c14953bd043e28
  attributes:
  b3f9d7015fd3456aa:
    - quantity: 5

If no categories are determined to match, then the follow response should be returned.

categories: 
- category_id: None found
  attributes:
  Not applicable
  - None Found: NULL

For the following inquiry determine any matching categories and attributes.   If there are no attribute values in the customer inquiry then use "Not applicable" as the attribute id, "None found" as the attribute name and "NULL" as the attribute value.

"I need a refund for the concert that was cancelled and then I want to purchase some reserved seating tickets for next month."

chosen:
categories:
- category_id: 7b153107ade946b8b
  attributes:
  - 69842a8ad13646aaa
  event_name: concert
- category_id: fbc66417213d4adbb
  attributes:
  - Not_applicable
  None Found: NULL
rejected:
categories:
- category_id: 7b153107ade946b8b
  attributes:
  f30824f379b54db48:
    - ticket_id: None found
    - event_name: concert
    - purchase_date: None found
    - purchase_method: None found
  d4e3b983917c43bf9:
    - ticket_id: None found
    - event_name: concert
    - purchase_date: None found
    - purchase_method: None found
  f0326ec66b9649609:
    - ticket_id: None found
    - event_name: concert
    - purchase_date: None found
    - purchase_method: None found
  Not applicable:
    - ticket_id: None found
    - event_name: concert
    - purchase_date: None found
    - purchase_method: None found
  - None Found: NULL
- category_id: 360c14953bd043e28
  attributes:
  b3f9d7015fd3456aa:
    - quantity: 5
  Not applicable:
    - ticket_id: None found
    - event_name: None found
    - purchase_date: None found
    - purchase_method: None found
  - None Found: NULL
- category_id: 218fa84df2ae4d9d9
  attributes:
  issue_description: None found
  device_type: None found
  device_brand: None found
  device_model: None found
  keyboard_type:
